meta.title: JC-WH_Outward_scene
meta.description: Scene for the adaptive tracks when used on the outward leg of walk (JC to WH)

scenes.name: track1/MitaDelMundo
scenes.description: first track, starts at CS building on Jubilee campus and ends at the turning onto Wollaton Road. This uses three waypoints forming two routes to calculte the walking distance / time
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track2/SisterCities'); } else if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (waypoints['W3'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length : waypoints['W3'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track2/SisterCities
scenes.description: second track, Sister Cities starts at the left hand trun from the main enterance onto Wollaton Road. This route uses 4 waypoints that from 3 routes to calculate the walking distance (wollaton rd to wollaton rd. and middleton rd. roundabout, the middleton rd. roundabout to the pedestrain crossing, then the pedestrian crossing to enterace of Harrow Rd. This is a multitrack scene - routes R1 and R2 have all stems at full volume, whereas R3 drops the volume on the 'drums' 'guitars' and 'vox', to cover the full duration of the pedestrain crossing
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near && !routes['R3'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track3/NotAlone'); } else if (waypoints['W4'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length+routes['R3'].length : (routes['R2'].nearest ? waypoints['W3'].distance+routes['R3'].length : waypoints['W4'].distance))/1.5; }

scenes.name: track3/NotAlone
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'Not Alone' when turning left onto Harrow Road. This uses 3 waypoints to form 2 routes. the purpose of the second route is to enable a long fade from 'R2' to the start of Rnext, so that the track gradually fades before the next enters
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest || routes['Rnext'].distanceAlong>0) { daoplayer.setScene('track4/Stella'); } else if (waypoints['W3'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length : waypoints['W3'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track4/Stella
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'Stella when entering into Digby Av, in the grounds of Wollaton hall. it uses 3 waypoints to form two routes. This is a multi-track scene. for 'R1' only the 'StellaVox' and 'StellaPiano' are at full volume. When 'R2' is reached (end of the school playing field and start of golf course the other two stems fade in to full volume
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track5/TheBadGuys'); } else if (waypoints['W3'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length : waypoints['W3'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track5/TheBadGuys
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'TheBadGuys' approx half-way along Digby Ave. Only uses 2 waypoint to form 1 route to calcuate walking distance/time
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('track6/WaitingForGA'); } else if (waypoints['W3'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length : waypoints['W3'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: track6/WaitingForGA
scenes.description: this scene changes track to 'WaitingForGA' at the top of the hill on Digby Ave. This uses 3 waypoints and two routes to calculte distance/time, as the route double backs on itself
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near && !routes['R2'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArrivalMusic'); } else if (waypoints['W3'].distance!==undefined) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+(routes['R1'].nearest ? waypoints['W2'].distance+routes['R2'].length : waypoints['W3'].distance)/1.5; }

scenes.name: WollatonHallArrivalMusic
scenes.description: this scene changes to the first layer of Wollaton Hall arrival music when approaching. There are four layers for this arrival music and which come in one by one all stacked togther. Would like a long cross-fade from track6/WaitingForGA into this
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Start'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/any'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('WollatonHallArrived'); } }

scenes.name: WollatonHallArrived
scenes.description: This is the final music for arrival at Wollaton Hall, which will continue to loop around as the participants fill in the questionnire. It has two layers, WollatonHallArriveB_Accent' sounds just once (has no repeats set on the track script), whereas 'WollatonHallArriveB_Layer1' loops indefinatley
scenes.onupdate: if (activity=='NOGPS') { if (totalTime-window.lastGps>20) { daoplayer.setScene('Return'); } else if (window.estimatedEnd<totalTime+10) window.estimatedEnd=totalTime+10; } else { window.lastGps=totalTime; if (!routes['R1'].near) { daoplayer.setScene('Start/return'); } else if (routes['Rnext'].nearest) { daoplayer.setScene('fixedPlaylistIn'); } }

scenes.name: fixedPlaylistIn
scenes.description: this scene is for the fixed playlist of music that accompanies the walk back. A short 'route' that covers the inital heading back initiates this playlist. After initiation, no other GPS intervention is scripted
